name: eye (Zoey Frost)
description:
arrow keys or WASD to run and look

spacebar to jump

r to reset in case you are stuck

ur a weird walking eyeball who fell in a hole.

look at switches to activate them

current known issues: if you mash on the keys too much it can clip you into the floors or walls and get you stuck.  i can't be bothered to fix this kind of thing so just don't get too wild okay
